name: Omox Demon

specials.name: Purity Vulnerability
specials.description: Omox demons are given form by filth. The Omox is always a valid target for Create Water (touch range). Enhance Victuals, Neutralize Poison, Purify Food and Drink, Remove Disease and Restoration. Instead of their usual effects, the Omox Demon takes 1d6 damage per level of the spell.

specials.name: Sticky Sludge
specials.description: Trigger: a foe critically fails a melee attack roll against the Omox. The Omox immediately attempts to grab the target. If the triggering attack was made by a melee weapon the creature can choose to release it and be disarmed instead of being grabbed.

specials.name: Liquid Leap
specials.description: The Omox can use its 4th level Dimension Door innate spell with only a single action so long as it begins and ends the movement within a single contiguous body of liquid.

specials.name: Slime
specials.description: Any creature struck by the Omox's Slime Glob must make a DC 32 Reflex save or suffer a -10 penalty to its speeds for 1 round. If the target Critically Fails this save it is instead immobilized for 1 round.

specials.name: Smothering
specials.description: An Omox can grab creatures of any size. Whiel holding the victim, the victim can neither speak nor breath (see drowning rules), it must also make a Fortitude save against Omox Demon Poison each time it begins its turn grappled. If swimming, the Omox can swim up to half its speed and take its victim with it.

specials.name: Omox Demon Poison
specials.description:
Source: Sludge Strike, Slime Glob, Smothering
DC 32 Fortitude save; Maximum duration: 6 rounds.
Stage 1: 2d6 poison damage and drained 1 (1 round),
Stage 2: 2d6 poison damage and drained 2 (1 round),
Stage 3: 2d6 poison damage and drained 3 (1 round).

savenote: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
spells: abyssal plague, cloudkill, dimension door, control water, telekinetic haul
create water, taint food and drink

weakness.value: cold iron 10, good 10, water 10 (must be pure water)

immunity.value: acid, critical hits, disease, poison, precision, unconscious
